bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon w/InTension main frame & seatstay, aluminum chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert DH, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, integrated frame protection, internal control routing, HexMC carbon EVO Link, Mino Link, MicroTruss, 210mm travel

components.description: Fox Factory Series 40 FIT RC2 w/air spring, Kashima coating, hi/lo speed compression, rebound, 20mm thru axle, 203mm travel

Fox Factory Series DHX RC4 w/bottom-out force adjust and bottom-out progressiveness, external rebound, hi/lo speed compression, Kashima coating; 8.75x2.75" (S 400lb; M 450lb; L 500lb; XL 500lb spring), tuned by Trek in California
DT Swiss 240s, 20mm front hub; 157x12mm rear hub w/DT Swiss FR 600 32-hole rims
